Author: roastbeeftacohat

Comment: oh i'm aware. my mother's one of these people, despite being totally sympathetic to FDR as well. she even believes in taxing the rich massively etc., and would be thrilled at a new FDR-like figure attaining office. trying to discuss politics with her recently has taught me a lot about the nature of media: it's less about defining viewers' preferences per se, and more about creating a powerful perception of what the options are, and what is normal. change the framing and someone's own actual still-existing preferences will be ignored completely and dismissed as "unrealistic", or change it another way and you'll find thousands of people feeling devoted fervor for something they never previously saw as possible.
Author: wavygrave
